instructions: In a conversation, rotate iPhone to landscape orientation. Tap the Handwriting button on the keyboard. Write a message with your finger or choose a saved message at the bottom, then tap Done. Tap the Send button to send your message or the Remove button to cancel.

In a new or existing conversation, type a message or insert a photo or Memoji. Touch and hold the Send button , then tap the gray dots to preview different bubble effects. Tip: Want to send a personal message? When you use invisible ink, the message remains blurred until the recipient swipes to reveal it. Tap the Send button to send the message or the Remove button to cancel.

In a new or existing conversation, type a message or insert a photo or Memoji. Touch and hold the Send button , then tap Screen. Swipe left to preview different screen effects. Tap the Send button to send the message or the Remove button to cancel.
